# Why automation is important

Examples where data is lost (bycicle)
Lack of time to scrape at all times


```{r}

library(scrapex)
library(httr2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)

parse_data <- function(req) {
  req %>%
    resp_body_json() %>%
    transpose() %>%
    as_tibble() %>%
    unnest()
}

api <- api_bicing()

api_authors <- paste0(api$api_web, "/api/v1/real_time_bicycles")

# Show docs
req <-
  request(api_authors)

bicing <-
  req %>%
  req_perform() %>%
  parse_data()

bicing


bicing <-
  req %>%
  req_perform() %>%
  parse_data()

bicing
```
